School (district) : Carey Elementary (Blaine)
Role(s) : pk-6th Engineering and Design Teacher;Upper Elementary Teacher (3rd+);Early Elementary Teacher (K-2nd);
LinkedIn Profile : I am also a rural EMT, and work weekly with a local non-profit that helps bring food and resources to individuals/families 

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* This seems like a fantastic way to just learn more and take that knowledge and experience back into my own classroom.
